summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 3.2°C) and outside temperature (up 2.4°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 1.9 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 3000 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1772 m), light levels (up 8625 lux), and inside temperature (up 2.3°C) when compared to today.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 713m to 1594m and averaged 879.0m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; the temperature will feel pleasantly warm. Also, extremely heavy humidity levels and winds will be practically absent. Some rain can be expected, partial cloudiness with some periods of sun, and periods of sunshine are expected. Weather could become unsettled.
